channel.title: +Fun on Vishvas's English lit
channel.description: Recent content in +Fun on Vishvas's English lit

item.title: One time chef
item.description: A One Time Chef It is hard to stop laughing when we remember pieces of our college life. I just woke up laughing this morning, recollecting one incident when I was deemed the best chef. The thing is, Martin Luther in Halle those days did not have that many deshi students. The student body organized a food-fest and there were students from so many countries participating, but nobody from Nepal, not even from India.
